param_schema.description: Duration of the generated audio (in seconds). Higher duration may OOM.

parameters.name: guidance_scale

param_schema.title: Guidance Scale
param_schema.description: Guidance scale for the model. (Large scale -> better quality and relavancy to text; small scale -> better diversity)
